using UnityEngine;
using UnityEngine.UI;
using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using Tools.AutoBind;

namespace ${Namespace}
{
    public partial class ${ClassName}
    {
        #region Auto Bind Fields
${Fields}
        #endregion

        #region Binding Methods
        private void BindComponents()
        {
            var binder = GetComponent<AutoBindComponent>();
            if (binder == null)
            {
                Debug.LogError($"[{GetType().Name}] AutoBindComponent not found!");
                return;
            }

${BindingCode}
        }

        private void UnBindComponents()
        {
${UnBindingCode}
        }

        #endregion
    }
}
